verbs.description: [ARG0: hartford jury] [V: takes] [ARG1: 30 minutes] [ARG0: to convict joseph silva in two murders] a hartford jury took 20 to 30 minutes tuesday to convict joseph silva of two counts of murder and a single count of murder with special circumstances he faces live in prison without the possibility of release jury joseph silva robin krawczyk 30 minutes joshua cortez hartford ron goulart alysha ocasio
